rows.label: qst201203_msg0001
rows.name: Hey, why did you run from us?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0002
rows.name:
Eeeeeek!
B-brother! Look!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0003
rows.name:
D-d-don't worry!
I'll protect you!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0004
rows.name: Come on now, we don't want to-

rows.label: qst201203_msg0005
rows.name:
...Do you want to fight?
...It won't end well, you know?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0006
rows.name: W-w-waaaaaaahh!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0007
rows.name:
Seori, what are you doing scaring
them like that?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0008
rows.name: ...I felt my blood boil.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0009
rows.name:
Oh for crying out...
Seori, just step back.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0010
rows.name:
...It's fine, lads.
We're not gonna hurt you.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0011
rows.name: ...Really?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0012
rows.name:
Yes, I swear!
Just tell me, why did you run?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0013
rows.name: ...Our daddy is a wharfie here in town.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0014
rows.name:
But last year, him and his mates got
beaten up by a two-Blade team...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0015
rows.name:
His mates were almost in pieces,
and he just barely pulled through...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0016
rows.name: ...A two-Blade team, huh...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0017
rows.name:
He said the two Blades were girls, and
both had eyepatches, and they used
ice and water powers, and were bad.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0018
rows.name:
It was you, wasn't it?
You're girls, and you've got the
eye-thingies!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0019
rows.name:
...No, it's not...
It was us, but it wasn't...US, you know?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0020
rows.name:
Don't get any closer!
I won't let you hurt Veero!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0022
rows.name:
Mikumari, it'd be best
to leave these kids alone.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0023
rows.name: We may not remember any of it...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0024
rows.name:
But that doesn't change the fact
we've hurt a lot of people.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0025
rows.name:
For us it's a past we've lost, but for
the people of this town it's a past
they can never forget.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0026
rows.name: ...That's so...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0027
rows.name:
Let's go, Mikumari.
We shouldn't even be here...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0029
rows.name: Hang on, you two.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0030
rows.name:
Sure, you may have done bad stuff
before, but the new you are definitely
not bad people!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0031
rows.name:
Trust me,
nobody knows it better than us.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0032
rows.name:
There is no way to change the past,
but you can change the present.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0033
rows.name: There is yet time to make amends.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0034
rows.name:
Exactly! I'm sure the people here
will understand, if you just explain.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0035
rows.name: I see! You're right!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0036
rows.name:
Our past selves may have been villains,
but now we're changed!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0037
rows.name:
...Hey, you lads. Could we talk
to your father maybe?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0038
rows.name:
W-what?! Why?!
You wanna hurt him more?!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0039
rows.name: No, definitely not!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0040
rows.name:
We want to apologize for the past,
to your dad and everyone else.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0041
rows.name:
We want to let everyone know
we're different now!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0042
rows.name:
How many people do you imagine
we've hurt, Mikumari?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0043
rows.name: I don't think this is achievable...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0044
rows.name:
But we still have to do it, Seori!
After all, we've done so many wrongs...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0045
rows.name:
Don't worry, we'll make it work!
I'll be with you every step of the way!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0046
rows.name: ...That's...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0047
rows.name: We'll be there too, of course.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0048
rows.name:
Of course. We could never leave
our allies in a lurch.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0049
rows.name:
I'm not worried at all.
I'm sure everyone'll accept them,
no questions asked!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0050
rows.name:
...OK then.
I'll come, if you're all so certain.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0051
rows.name: But I think it's a waste of time...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0052
rows.name:
How about it? Do you believe now
that the girls aren't bad guys?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0053
rows.name:
Think you could take us
to see your dad?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0054
rows.name: ...Whaddya think...?

rows.label: qst201203_msg0055
rows.name: ...All right.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0056
rows.name: I don't think they're lying or anythin'...

rows.label: qst201203_msg0057
rows.name:
If you promise not to hurt our daddy,
I'll take you.

rows.label: qst201203_msg0058
rows.name:
Really? Great!
Of course, I promise!

rows.label: qst201203_msg0059
rows.name:
Daddy's in the Fons Maim Port.
Let's go together.
